body_html:
No but in the 0.2.3 baseline there was a change that have been rolled back
in 0.3 that cause the missing external directory. 0.2.3 itself does not
contains the culprit change but if the repository was not cloned from the
tag then there might be the culprit.

On Tue, Jun 21, 2016, 8:36 AM Martin Wicke notifications@github.com wrote:

@damienmg https://github.com/damienmg do we effectively require bazel
0.3 at this point?

body:
No but in the 0.2.3 baseline there was a change that have been rolled back
in 0.3 that cause the missing external directory. 0.2.3 itself does not
contains the culprit change but if the repository was not cloned from the
tag then there might be the culprit.

> @damienmg https://github.com/damienmg do we effectively require bazel
> 0.3 at this point?
